faq.q: Do I need to keep my nursing license?
faq.a: Not necessarily for coaching, but many nurse coaches maintain their RN for credibility and scope flexibility. We help you decide what's right for your situation.

faq.q: Can I coach while still working as a nurse?
faq.a: Absolutely. Most of our graduates start coaching part-time on their days off and transition to full-time once they build their client base.

faq.q: Will hospitals and doctors take me seriously?
faq.a: Your nursing background IS your credibility. Our graduates regularly receive physician referrals. The C.A.R.E.S. Method is designed for professional respect.
